doc.previous: In October 2012 Twitter announced it had hired former Google executive Matt Derella to become their new director of business agency development 95
doc.after: Twitter has become internationally identifiable by its signature bird logo The original logo was in use from its launch in March 2006 until September 2010 A slightly modified version succeeded the first style when the website underwent its first redesign
